text: @realDonaldTrump Right. Just like the coronavirus would miraculously dissapear after a few days or like the country was going to reopen at Easter. Your goalposts continue to move as you are CONSTANTLY proven wrong. You are pathetic leader. No scratch that you are no leader at all. Just a disgrace
